resources.string:
Hi, my name is Melba. 

I love pasta. 

I don't mind eating pasta a whole month 
Fun fact is that I really love photography. 
And sometimes I even go to take photos. 
I do love taking videos. 
I usually travel and then I make videos of my travels like a summary of everything. 
I spend a lot of time editing and getting new ideas to apply to my videos. I listen to many musics just to find the one that fits with my video
